GSD.description:
debugfs: add debugfs_lookup_and_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 68f22c80c18186f3dba9b2b60bd05488987ae7ce. For more details please see the references link.
